pages.text: Managing the occult is a key-competence of any aspiring Entheator. It requires $(li)Keeping sanity at a reasonable level$(li)Warding off $(marked)Investigators$()$(br2)Both can be achieved by casting not too many $(ml:rites/rite_intro)rites$(). Additionally, sanity can be regenerated using medicine such as $(item)Tranquilizers$() and $(item)Laudanum$().

Low sanity will result in continuous debilitation and, eventually, $(marked)death$(), so be careful.$(br)Likewise, $(marked)Investigators$() are also quite deadly. To prevent them from appearing in the first place, rites can be decorated to increase (or decrease) subtlety.$(br)You should eliminate any Investigator you come across with, but be wary: getting killed by one will destroy most of your progress.
